FuncDef: This command specifies an IPv4 route (prefix/length) per subscriber-interface to be monitored in the FDB to determine liveness of the subscriber-interface (and consequently all associated group-interfaces of type wlangw) on a peer WLAN-GW. This route is the one that is advertised in routing by the peer WLAN-GW when the subscriber-interface and WLAN-GW group are operationally up

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP prefix and length. Values-ip-prefix:a.b.c.d.
